html: One of the 1st actions I took in Congress was introducing 2 bills that support Sandy victims who were wronged by FEMA and the federal govt. Now law, these policies prohibit FEMA from recouping disaster assistance grants from survivors and give them greater access to federal aid.
text: One of the 1st actions I took in Congress was introducing 2 bills that support Sandy victims who were wronged by FEMA and the federal govt. Now law, these policies prohibit FEMA from recouping disaster assistance grants from survivors and give them greater access to federal aid.

html: Thanks to volunteers, law enforcement, and the National Guard, our community has been able to put the pieces back together. I’ll continue to do all I can to make the federal govt more accountable for their missteps and I will not rest until every last Sandy survivor is back home.
text: Thanks to volunteers, law enforcement, and the National Guard, our community has been able to put the pieces back together. I’ll continue to do all I can to make the federal govt more accountable for their missteps and I will not rest until every last Sandy survivor is back home.

html: Included in the final opioid bill is the Every Prescription Conveyed Securely Act, a policy that would require all Medicare Part D prescriptions to be transmitted electronically. This provision better helps address doctor shopping, forged prescriptions, and theft.pic.twitter.com/xYafaOMeNa
